titleStmt.title: The secretaries studie containing new familiar epistles: or directions, for the formall, orderly, and iudicious inditing of letters. ... By Thomas Gainsford, Esq.
titleStmt.author: Gainsford, Thomas, d. 1624?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for Roger Iackson, and are to be solde at his shop in Fleetstreet, ouer against the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: The final two leaves contain "A dumpe or passion" (verse).
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet, ouer against the Conduit
